text: (And vie one with another for forgiveness from your Lord) hasten to repent of usury and from all transgressions and reach for forgiveness from your Lord, (and for a Paradise) by means of righteous works and avoidance of usury (as wide as are the heavens and the earth) if they were to be joined to each other, (prepared) created (for those who ward off (evil)) ward off disbelief, idolatry, indecencies, and the consumption of usury;
